short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, tag, and manage prompts for ChatGPT or any AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prompt Saver for ChatGPT: Organize & Access Prompts Effortlessly

Tired of retyping the same prompts in ChatGPT? Meet Prompt Saver, your smart companion to save, tag, and manage all your favorite prompts in one place! This sleek and intuitive extension lets you create and access prompts faster and more efficiently.

Key Features:
Quick Save & Tag: Easily save any ChatGPT prompt and assign it a custom tag for easy identification.
Organised View: See all your prompts neatly organised with tags. No more scrolling through endless notes!
Fast Access: Use the built-in Copy to Clipboard button to instantly copy prompts with a single click and paste them wherever needed.
Edit & Update: Need to tweak a prompt? No problem! Just click the Edit icon, make your changes, and save.
Easy Cleanup: Manage your list effortlessly with the Delete button, removing prompts you no longer need.

Save time, stay organised, and make interacting with AI more efficient with Prompt Saver!
